channel.title: Help
channel.description:
Alright so I made a ring to give double xp.
I came up with this:
[code] amount *= Config.SERVER_EXP_BONUS; if (c.playerEquipment[c.playerRing] == 18819) amount *= 1;[/code]
I want to make this a donator feature where it only allows you to wield the ring if you are a donator & it shows a message below saying you need to be a donator to wear this ring.
Please help :confused: I'll rep++

item.title: Help
item.dc:creator: @zoomer zoomer
item.description:
@zoomer wrote:

Thanks man!

& sorry decided to make Korasi’s sword donator & make it double xp when wielding.

I’ll rep++ anyways!

Read full topic

item.title: Help
item.dc:creator: @ExtremeX-Scape Ryley
item.description:
@ExtremeX-Scape wrote:

ItemAssistant

public void getRequirements

under the switch in that void

switch(itemId)

add,

		case ITEM_ID:
			if (c.isDonator == 0) && (c.playerRights == 0) {
				c.sendMessage("You need to be a donator to use this.");
				return;
			} else {
				c.sendMessage("Your message when the donator weilds the item.");
			}
			break;

Read full topic
